class.name: MaterialManager
class.brief_description: Thread-safe manager for MaSzyna materials and textures.
class.description: The [MaterialManager] is responsible for locating, loading, and caching MaSzyna's material files (.mat) and textures (.dds). It translates these assets into Godot's [StandardMaterial3D] and [ImageTexture] resources. It implements an internal thread-safe cache to optimize performance and prevent duplicate resource creation.

method.name: get_material
method.description: Retrieves a cached [StandardMaterial3D] or creates a new one by parsing the MaSzyna material definition. Automatically detects alpha transparency from textures and handles special "sky" material properties.

method.name: get_material_path
method.description: Searches for a [code].mat[/code] file within the MaSzyna directory structure, checking both model-specific and global texture directories.

method.name: get_texture
method.description: Loads a texture directly from a given path relative to the MaSzyna root or global texture folders.

method.name: load_material
method.description: Internal helper to parse a [code].mat[/code] file into a [MaszynaMaterial] resource.

method.name: load_submodel_texture
method.description: Loads a texture specifically for a submodel context.

method.name: load_texture
method.description: Locates and loads a [code].dds[/code] file, converting it into an [ImageTexture]. If the file is not found, a fallback "missing texture" is returned.
